comment.author: 68221252@N08
comment._content: Isn't the man the same as under tyhe palm tree 2 pictures back from this one?

comment.author: 97461181@N08
comment._content:
This is interesting. I wonder who the lady sitting beside the little girl is? Is she the mother or grandmother? If she is the grandmother then she would be the mother of the gentleman, however, I zoomed in and she doesn't look old enough to be his mother so is she his wife?
If so, then who is the woman sitting on chair in white? Is she the nanny? Maybe she is actually the wife? I have absolutely no idea. What I do have an idea about though is that the woman in white and the man are definitely in some sort of relationship together. Just look at the way he is staring at her, even though the woman in hat beside little girl is looking at him, he is looking past her straight at the other woman who in return is gazing straight back into his eyes.
If woman in white is his wife, that explains it but if she isn't then there's some food for thought there....
